title: ivanArO sakhiyE
sahitya:
ivanArO sakhiyE ennedirilE iravi pOl vanda sukhiyE


anupallavi

  shivanAr tarum iLa maghanArO SaNmukhanArO hrdaya guhanArO


caraNam    nangai enadu mAna bhangam sheidAnaDI nANattuDanE oru kONa pArvai pArttadum
kongai tuDituDikka shen kaiyAl aNaitt-uLLam koLLai koNDu pOna kaLLan en kAdalan
